name: Business Empire Tycoon Lite
description:
Begin building your business empire with buying and selling vegetables on the market to manufacture groceries for your many customers.  Grow your profits and customer base by expanding to include meats, eggs, breads, and so much more as new building projects become available.  Expand your empire by taking advantage of the many opportunities that are offered to become a Business empire Tycoon.

Business Empire Tycoon is perfect for all ages and skill levels.
